trans-unit.source: Raises a <xref href="System.Data.DataTableCollection.CollectionChanged"></xref> event when a <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> is added to or removed from the <xref href="System.Data.DataTableCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Data.DataTableCollection.CollectionChanged"></xref>事件时<xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>是添加或删除从<xref href="System.Data.DataTableCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件源。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件数据。
